alert.note: Alert for Nolan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 17 at 3:28PM CDT until August 17 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Nolan County in west central Texas... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 327 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over The Intersection Of Highway 70 And Ranch Road 53, or near Nolan, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Blackwell and Maryneal around 400 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include The Intersection Of Highway 70 And Ranch Road 53. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
